Trustee_15_pre_2.name: Ahmed Hassan
Trustee_15_pre_2.content: During this investment process, I demonstrated fairness and transparency by proposing a profit-sharing plan that favored the investor. I managed the investment efficiently and ensured that profit distributions were in accordance with our agreement, reinforcing my reputation as a trustworthy and ethical trustee. My previous reputation was neutral due to lack of historical context, but this positive experience positions me better in future investments. Overall, I view myself as reliable and committed to promoting the long-term interests of my investors.
